tool_description:
Vatlayer is a simple REST-based JSON API offering instant EU VAT number validation, VAT compliant price calculations and VAT rates for all 28 current member states of the European Union. Its system is secured by HTTPS and focused on ease of use & integration, delivering all VAT data in lightweight and highly portable JSON format.

This level of compatibility, paired with startup- and developer-friendly pricing and a full stack of features makes the vatlayer API a perfect VAT rate automation and number validation tool for individuals, businesses and merchants selling and buying goods in and around the European Union.
name: vatlayer
title: vatlayer

api_list.name: Single EU VAT Rate
api_list.description: Using the "rate" endpoint, you may request the API to return standard and reduced VAT rates for a EU member state you specify. Important: Only one of the following three parameters for defining the country is allowed.

optional_parameters.name: country_code
optional_parameters.description: Option 1 - define country by 2-letter country code

optional_parameters.name: ip_address
optional_parameters.description: Option 2 - define country by IP address

optional_parameters.name: use_client_ip
optional_parameters.description: Option 3 - set to "1" in order to use the IP of the client making the API request

api_list.name: Request all EU VAT Rates
api_list.description: Use the API's "rate_list" endpoint to obtain standard & reduced VAT rates for all 28 current member states
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://apilayer-vatlayer-v1.p.rapidapi.com/rate_list"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "apilayer-vatlayer-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Calculate EU VAT Compliant Price
api_list.description: Use the "price" endpoint, you may request the API to calculate a country-specific VAT compliant price on your behalf. Important: There are 3 options to define a country - choose only one!

required_parameters.name: amount
required_parameters.description: "amount" parameter - append the amount to convert to VAT compliant price

optional_parameters.name: country_code
optional_parameters.description: Option 1 - define country by 2-letter country code

optional_parameters.name: ip_address
optional_parameters.description: Option 2 - define country by IP address

optional_parameters.name: use_client_ip
optional_parameters.description: Option 3 - set to "1" in order to use the IP of the client making the API request

optional_parameters.name: incl
optional_parameters.description: set to "1" in case your amount already contains the respective VAT percentage

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description: define a reduced VAT "type" (product category) according to the API's "type" endpoint

api_list.name: Request list of types of goods
api_list.description: Request an entire list of all available "types of goods", which fall into reduced VAT categories in specific EU member states
